clang-analyzer-cplusplus.InnerPointer.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-cplusplus.InnerPointer
Check for inner pointers of C++ containers used after re/deallocation.
The
clang-analyzer-cplusplus.InnerPointer
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-cplusplus.InnerPointer.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
